amendment.description: To let Federal revenues reflect continued leasing of oil and gas on Federal lands.

vote.text: Amendment SA 770 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 50. Record Vote Number: 40.

action.text: Amendment SA 770 proposed by Senator Lee. (consideration: CR S451; text: CR S451) To let Federal revenues reflect continued leasing of oil and gas on Federal lands.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 770 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 50. Record Vote Number: 40.
